intro1:
I'm a developer from Portugal who builds end-to-end web products, from UX and UI to APIs and data.

I work mainly with TypeScript/JavaScript across React and Next.js on the frontend and Node.js on the backend, using SQL/Postgres, REST APIs, and modern tooling to ship reliable and performant systems.
intro2: I'm an engineer who thrives on building systems and has hands-on experience across all aspects of the development process, from architecting repositories and shaping user experience flows to building intuitive UIs and implementing core backend features.
